Package com.bluegosling.concurrent.futures

Utilities and new classes related to using CompletableFuture and CompletionStage.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CompletionStageFuture<T>
    A Future that also provides the fluent API of CompletionStage.
    RunnableCompletionStageFuture<T>
    A combination of RunnableFuture and CompletionStageFuture.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CompletableFutures
    Additional helper methods for creating and using instances of CompletableFuture.
    InterruptibleCompletableFuture<T>
    A CompletableFuture that provides a mechanism for interrupting an in-progress computation when the future is cancelled.
    ReadOnlyCompletableFuture<T>
    A completable future whose public API is read-only.
    RunnableCompletableFuture<T>
    A completable future that represents a task.
    RunnableReadOnlyCompletableFuture<T>
    A read-only completable future that represents a task.

Package com.bluegosling.concurrent.futures Description

Utilities and new classes related to using CompletableFuture and CompletionStage. These include read-only versions of CompletableFuture, which prevent code from arbitrarily completing or obtruding the futures. It also includes runnable versions, which can be given to an Executor to run some associated task (in the same vein as RunnableFuture).
